# Extended Markdown Features

## Footnotes

Here is a sentence with a footnote[^1].

Another sentence with a different footnote[^note].

[^1]: This is the first footnote.
[^note]: This is a named footnote with more detail.

## Abbreviations

The HTML specification is maintained by the W3C.

*[HTML]: HyperText Markup Language
*[W3C]: World Wide Web Consortium

## Definition Lists (Markdown Extension)

Term 1
: Definition for term 1

Term 2
: Definition for term 2
: Another definition for term 2

## Emoji (GitHub-style)

:rocket: :sparkles: :bug: :white_check_mark: :warning:

## Superscript/Subscript (if supported)

H~2~O is water.

X^2^ is X squared.

## Highlight (if supported)

==This text is highlighted==

## Math (if supported)

Inline: $E = mc^2$

Block:

$$
\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = x_1 + x_2 + \cdots + x_n
$$
